title: Average regular season home attendance of the Chicago Bears 2008 to 2019
summary: This graph depicts the average regular season home attendance of the seattle seahawks from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average attendance at home games of the seattle seahawks was 68990 . seattle seahawks average home attendance - additional information The seattle seahawks ' average regular season home attendance has remained relatively constant in recent years , with the average in the 2019 season standing at 68990 .
gold: This graph depicts the average regular season home attendance of the Chicago Bears from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average attendance at home games of the Chicago Bears was 61,916 .
